casebody.data:
Antonio Joseph MCKENDALL
v.
LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY & CORRECTIONS, et al. NO. 2018-CI-1444 Supreme Court of Louisiana. December 17, 2018

WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in *595this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b).
